meanings.sent1: The repairers fixed my broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The repairers are skilled at fixing electronics.
meanings.sent3: The repairers joked about having to fix the same item twice.
meanings.sent4: The repairers were like wizards, magically restoring broken things.
meanings.sent5: The repairers diligently work to make things whole again.

meanings.definition: Those who fix or mend damaged items.
meanings.sent1: We called the repairers to fix our leaky faucet.
meanings.sent2: The repairers arrived promptly to mend the torn curtains.
meanings.sent3: The repairers playfully argued about who could fix the item faster.
meanings.sent4: The repairers were like superheroes, swooping in to save the day.
meanings.sent5: The repairers skillfully patched up the damaged furniture.
